htmlbody: Democràcia Electrònica(Electronic Democracy) aims to promote reflection and debate about the role in democratic innovation of new information and communication technologies, that is to say, about what some people call electronic democracy. Here you will find papers and links to webs related to this subject. Also, Democràcia Electrònica offers a complete directory of links to the web sites of the main institutions, organisations and political parties in Catalonia, Spain, the rest of European Union countries, North America and others.
title: Democràcia Electrònica
